comment: Paypal has banned Gab.com in the wake of today's shooting. Funny, the shooter also had Twitter and Facebook accounts. I don't see Paypal going after them. Disgusting! The internet needs an alt-payment gateway ASAP!
amr:
# ::snt Paypal has banned Gab.com in the wake of today's shooting. Funny, the shooter also had Twitter and Facebook accounts. I don't see Paypal going after them. Disgusting! The internet needs an alt-payment gateway ASAP!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / ban-01
            :ARG0 (c / company
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Paypal"))
            :ARG1 (u / url-entity
                  :value "Gab.com")
            :time (w / wake
                  :mod (s / shoot-02
                        :time (t / today))))
      :snt2 (f / funny-02
            :ARG1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of s))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (a2 / account
                        :mod (p2 / publication
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Twitter")))
                  :op2 (a3 / account
                        :mod (p3 / publication
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Facebook"))))
            :mod (a4 / also))
      :snt3 (s2 / see-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (g / go-03
                  :ARG0 (c2 / company
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Paypal"))
                  :ARG1 (t2 / they)))
      :snt4 (d / disgust-01
            :mode expressive)
      :snt5 (n5 / need-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / internet)
            :ARG1 (g2 / gateway
                  :mod (p4 / pay-01
                        :mod (a5 / alt)))
            :time (a6 / ASAP)))

comment: I'm so sick of all this 'stop the hate-speech' screeching from the left. along with and others have had their PayPals banned. It's just an excuse to 'curate' acceptable speech by punishing those who question the leftist narrative, which means a leftist echo-chamber.

comment: I am not thrilled with the president either, but I don't believe we should use such hateful language against anyone!
amr:

            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :mod (e / either))
      :ARG2 (b / believe-01

comment: Hi There, please refrain from using derogatory comments in the thread. They are hurtful and unwanted. If you continue Admin will be alerted
